participant_1.background:
I have a van that has a lot of room for my cooking supplies and equipment, and for when I'm traveling.
i work from home doing various jobs on the internet.
i am chubby.
I manage my bakery while trying to figure out my mental health.
i m learning to play the guitar.

participant_2.background:
I am a busy person, but my family is always there for me.
I wake up in a different hotel every morning, and I spend my day exploring new places and meeting new people
i am slightly overweight , but my doctors say i m healthy.
I am returning home to spend time with my family and to continue my recovery from my injury.
i own a pug , and he s the most loyal pet you ll ever have.

content.text: Hello, how are you doing today?
Doing well! Today is my last day of work before I return home for a few weeks.
Oh that is exciting! Are you excited to be home?
Yes, I am looking forward to seeing my family and friends, and my dog.
That sounds great! I am a bit jealous.
Well, you are always welcome to visit. I am sure my dog would love a new playmate.
Thanks for the offer! I might just take you up on that.
Anytime! So, what do you do for a living?
I am a baker. I manage my own bakery.
That sounds like a fun job! I love baking.
It is! I love coming up with new recipes and trying new things.
That is awesome! What is your favorite thing to bake?
I love making bread. I love the smell of fresh bread baking.
Bread is delicious! I love it with butter and jam.
Me too! I also love it with cheese and ham.
That sounds delicious! I am getting hungry thinking about it.
Me too! I think I am going to have to go make some bread.
That sounds like a great idea! I will have to come over and try some.
